text: 10.25 Lom 13.11, Plp 4.5, Hib 3.13, 2 Pi 3.9-11, 3.14 Chɨn God binɨb ne mɨdobun okok, pelpel apnan gɨnɨgun. Binɨb ogɨnap apnan gɨnɨgun anɨb ak kelɨgɨpal ak pen, chɨn ma yɨbɨl anɨgɨnɨgun. Pen Bɨawl ownɨgab ñɨn ak wulep mɨdeb agɨl, takaw tep ak kɨles gɨl agñɨl gos sek mɨdɨl, pelpel apnan gɨnɨgun.
